snippet: The network will carry the first eight Thursday night games of the 2015 season after a successful eight-game run this season.
abstract: CBS will continue to broadcast Thursday night NFL football games in 2015 season.
lead_paragraph: The network will carry the first eight Thursday night games of the 2015 season after a successful eight-game run this season.

headline.main: CBS Renews Its Thursday Football Deal
headline.print_headline: CBS Renews Its Thursday Football Deal
